sentences.sContent: Her apron was speckled with oil.
sentences.sCn: 她的围裙上粘满了油污。

sentences.sContent: She stitched a pocket on the new apron.
sentences.sCn: 她在新围裙上缝上一只口袋。

sentences.sContent: She was cinctured with a deer-skin apron.
sentences.sCn: 她身上裹着一条鹿皮围裙。

phrases.pCn: 码头岸肩；自码头货棚至水边间的空间

remMethod.val: 在四月(April)穿上围裙(apron)去干活

trans.tranOther: a piece of clothing that covers the front part of your clothes and is tied around your waist, worn to keep your clothes clean, especially while cooking
